channel.title: Authors on Max Woolf's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Max Woolf's Blog

item.description: Max Woolf (@minimaxir) is a Data Scientist at BuzzFeed in San Francisco. In his spare time, Max uses Python to gather data from public data sources and R/ggplot2 to plot plenty of pretty charts from that data. On special occasions, he uses TensorFlow/Keras for fancy deep learning projects.
